item.title: Birth Of This Blog
item.description: In this article, I’ll document how I created this blog from scratch, for others who interested to clone a new one and also for myself as a future reference. 1. Hugo + Github Pages 1.1 Hugo Hugo is one of the most popular open-source static site generators. As it says, it can help you generate static site with tons of themes that shared and maintained by others. 1.2 Github Pages Github Pages helps you host a static website from one of your github repo directly and consistently

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: Sample article showcasing basic Markdown syntax and formatting for HTML elements.
